identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion: Spreadsheet power meets Spa-like calm
Content: Data is the hero, UI is the whisper
Zoom: Focus on the current month/category
Negative Space: Generous padding to reduce cognitive load

colors.gradients: NONE. Use solid colors or extremely subtle noise textures.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm h-10 px-6

cards.style: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-none px-0 h-10 transition-colors
inputs.note: Use 'flushed' style inputs for the spreadsheet feel, standard bordered inputs for forms.

charts.style: Minimalist, thin lines, soft fills. No grid lines unless necessary.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/70 border-white/20 (Use sparingly for sticky headers)
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background (opacity 0.02)

images.description: Soft pastel spheres for welcome screen or empty state
Abstract pastel shapes with ribbon for success states

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Soft Utility' theme: Clean, white backgrounds with soft pastel accents for categories.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings to give it a modern, friendly character.
For the Monthly Control page, create a custom grid that feels like a spreadsheet but looks like a modern app. Use 'flushed' inputs (border-bottom only) to reduce visual noise.
Ensure the 16 categories are color-coded using the provided palette.
Use Recharts for all data visualization. Keep charts clean: remove grid lines, use soft tooltips.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
Use the provided image URLs for empty states or the dashboard header.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with whitespace.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Prioritize Shadcn components but customize them to match the 'Soft Utility' theme (softer radii, lighter borders).
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
